lyrics:
21 contributorsshe looks to me lyricsverse 1 anthony kiedis
looks to me like heaven sent no lullaby kid no five percent
any way you wanna cut that cake
shes dyin from the likes of abandonment

prechorus anthony kiedis
lost in the valley without my horses
she needs somebody to hold

chorus anthony kiedis
it looked to me like heaven sent this for your roughest night
she looks to me she looks to me all right
whos gonna take you home and hold you when things arent so bright
she looks to me she looks to me all right

verse 2 anthony kiedis
its a long walk down those tracks its a dirty walk in its a dirty walk back
gonna learn away too much shootin dope in the back of a cadillac jack

prechorus anthony kiedis  john frusciante
slow down the road to my back 40
she needs somebody to hold

chorus anthony kiedis with john frusciante
it looked to me like heaven sent this for your roughest night
she looks to me she looks to me all right
whos gonna take you home and hold you when things arent so bright
she looks to me she looks to me all right
see red hot chili peppers liveget tickets as low as 75you might also likebridge anthony kiedis john frusciante
down in the south seas give me your mouth please
resuscitation is the way i found these
aah i give you major you give me minor
dont fade away like an ocean liner now

guitar solo john frusciante

prechorus anthony kiedis  john frusciante
lost in the valley without my horses
no one can tell me what my remorse is
god made this lady that stands before me
she needs somebody to hold

chorus anthony kiedis with john frusciante
she shows the world up with a smile and then she throws the fight
she looks to me she looks to me all right
down on the bathroom floor shes searching for another light
she looks to me she looks to me all right

outro anthony kiedis with john frusciante
she looked to me like heaven sent this for your roughest night
she looks to me she looks to me all right
whos gonna take you home and hold you when things arent so bright
she looks to me she looks to me12embed
